https://tmrev.io/movie/626469-A French Story 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null In Tulle, in the heart of France, a few days after the terrorist attacks in Paris, a German photographer is led through the town, where Nazis massacred civilians during World War Two, by a local guide. A little history within a much larger one. A French Story
